title: Trivia & Quiz Games
subtitle: Engage your fans by giving them the chance to flex their mental muscles and challenge their friends to a brand-themed social showdown.
intro_title: Social Media is All About Sharing and Showing (off).
intro_description: Drive more fan engagement, social sharing, and of course, plenty of smack talk amongst friends by activating a fun and memorable quiz or trivia contest on your brand's page.

features.title: History Lesson
features.description: Surely your hardcore fans know your history (hints are on your timeline) and they'll be up to challenge when you put their memory to the test.

features.title: Real-Time Trivia Match
features.description: Test your fans mental reflexes with a real-time trivia contest with prizes going to those that respond with the right answer first.

features.title: What is That?
features.description: Whether it's a zoomed in photo, or a specific place or thing, post a challenging image that will give your most loyal and socially aware fans the best shot at answering correctly.

features.title: Multiple Choice
features.description:
Give your fans a multiple choice quiz and let them learn a few things on their way to winning a prize.
Example: How many North Social apps have been installed on Fan Pages in the past two years?
a)10,000
b)50,000
c)100,000
d)150,000
(the answer is d; 150,000)
